TopicTitle: How to add a part to a category

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I got a mod installed that adds a part in the advanced motors category in the tech tree, I wanted it to be in the experimental motors category, so I changed the part file, since it says advancedMotors I tried to change it to experimentalMotors and expMotors but none of them works and the part just dissapears from the tech tree when I do this . Do somebody knows whats the name of the experimental motors category?. I tried the wiki but couldn't find that info.

I got Community Tech Tree and Seti CTT installed.

Thanks in advance for your help.
You might want to make a moduleManager config, then you can move it easier.
